attributes.action: We demand a third referendum vote on Brexit if a second vote swings to remain
attributes.background: Having a second referendum is undemocratic so a third will achieve status quo

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

The Government has said it doesn't intend to hold a second referendum. We therefore aren't sure whether you would like it to hold a second referendum and then a third or not.

You might like to sign this petition instead, which calls for the UK to leave the EU on 29 March 2019:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/243319
